function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reluctance to share personal data is a significant challenge for achieving the design and operation of buildings that support and promote occupant health.","Impact":"Privacy issues may hinder data collection and compromise the ability to create healthy indoor environments in buildings.","Mitigation":"Implement innovative data collection and storage privacy design principles and protocols to address privacy concerns and encourage data sharing.","Technologies":"Smart building technologies and secure data collection and storage protocols.","People":"Occupants, building professionals, and technology developers.","Owner":"Building professionals and technology developers."}]}
